steps.title: Enter the text
steps.description: Type or paste the text in which you want to count words.

steps.title: Enter the search word
steps.description: Input the word you want to count occurrences for.

steps.title: Use case-sensitive matching
steps.description: Choose whether to match the search word with the exact case or not.

steps.title: Click 'Count'
steps.description: After entering the text and search word, click the 'Count' button to find the word occurrences.
